name: Dakila: A Visual Novel PC Game
name_original: Dakila: A Visual Novel PC Game
description:
The game will let you understand why acceptance leads us to success. Having doubts in once hearts may only lead people not to try something new, or try what they are really aiming for because they are afraid to fall or to fail, but sometimes failure will lead you to try and try and reach for answers on how to succeed. 

This game will let you understand that don't be afraid to try, believe in yourself because there is always a someone out there who never loses faith in you.

This game is only for the teams CAPSTONE PROJECT thank you for downloading our game, we hope you'll like it and feel free to leave a comment and suggestions for our future updates - StarCrusaders
